objects.specification: A wide, flat floor surface with a smooth, polished concrete finish in light grey, seamless and sturdy to support heavy exhibits.
Tall, flat panel with a smooth white-painted surface, simple rectangular form, providing an enclosed exhibition space backdrop.

Raised rectangular platform with a matte black finish, subtle beveled edges and a non-slip surface to prominently showcase the demo vehicle.
A detailed 3D model of a modern demo car with a sleek aerodynamic body, metallic paint finish, tinted windows, realistic alloy wheel rims and rubber tires.
Modern reception desk with a gently curved front panel in warm wood veneer, white solid-surface countertop and integrated LED accent lighting on a sleek metal frame.
A demarcated seating zone on the floor, indicated by a low-profile matte painted border in subtle blue to define the visitor discussion area.
Modern square table with a smooth white laminate top and four slender black metal legs, offering a clean minimalist look.
Contemporary visitor chair with a molded plastic seat and back in matte white, supported by four sleek black metal legs.
